alert.note: Alert for Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:08AM CDT until June 08 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR JEFFERSON...NORTH CENTRAL SHAWNEE...SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA...EASTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 1208 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Kickapoo Reservation to 3 miles northeast of Denison to 4 miles south of Hoyt, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holton, Horton, Valley Falls, Oskaloosa, McLouth, Meriden, Hoyt, Ozawkie, Nortonville, Winchester, Wetmore, Mayetta, Everest, Robinson, Whiting, Denison, Netawaka, Powhattan, Willis and Kickapoo Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
